trans-unit.source: Selects one choice from a number of activities to execute, based on the value of a given expression of the type specified in this object’s type specifier.

Each case in the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Switch%601.Cases%2A> dictionary consists of a value (serving as the key for the dictionary) and an activity (serving as the value for the dictionary).
The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1.Expression%2A> is evaluated and compared against the keys in the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Switch%601.Cases%2A> dictionary.
If a match is found, the corresponding activity is executed.
Every key in the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Switch%601.Cases%2A> dictionary must be unique according to the dictionary’s equality comparer.
The type of the values provided in the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1.Cases"></xref> collection.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1"></xref> class.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1"></xref> class with the specified expression.
The expression to evaluate and compare against the values in the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1.Cases"></xref> dictionary.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1"></xref> class with the specified expression.
The expression to evaluate and compare against the values in the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1.Cases"></xref> dictionary.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1"></xref> class with the specified expression.
The expression to evaluate and compare against the values in the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1.Cases"></xref> dictionary.
Represents the dictionary of potential execution paths.
Each entry contains a key and an activity that is executed when the result of the expression matches the key.
When the activity executes, the case that is executed is the first case whose key matches the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1.Expression%2A> property.
The execution paths.

Represents the activity that is executed if no keys of entries in the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1.Cases"></xref> collection match the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1.Expression"></xref> property.
The default activity to execute.
Gets the object to compare to the keys in the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1.Cases"></xref> collection.
The comparison occurs after the expression is evaluated.
The object to compare to the keys in the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Switch`1.Cases"></xref> collection.
